profile.name: Brendan Eich
profile.headline: @brave Senior Software Engineer | Remote Developer | JavaScript Enthusiast
profile.summary: Results-driven developer with a passion for JavaScript and its ecosystem. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects, from open-source contributions to innovative solutions.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @brave
description: Led the development of a cutting-edge JavaScript project utilizing modern web technologies and best practices.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions, ensuring timely delivery and meeting stakeholder expectations.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple projects for various clients, including a meta-circular interpreter (narcissus) and a falsey object for Node.js (nil).
Presented at Strange Loop 2012 and BrazilJS 2015 to share knowledge and experiences with the developer community.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of the EcmaScript SIMD numeric type (ecmascript_simd) and worked on the website source code (website).
Maintained multiple open-source projects, ensuring their continued relevance and adoption in the developer community.
